content: in this legal case the marsala court has issued a ruling declaring the open succession of a deceased individual and identifying the legal heirs the court has dissolved the community property and assigned exclusive ownership of certain properties to the plaintiff the defendant has been ordered to reimburse the plaintiff for the costs of the proceedings the court has also approved a divisional project for the distribution of assets among the parties involved the ruling concludes by addressing the allocation of costs and expenses

metadata.cost: 545.00 EUR for disbursements and 6'500.00 EUR for professional fees
metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, company shares
